MAIN_MESSAGE: It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown for safety at 2:23PM in the LL58 postcode area of Beaumaris following reports of a safety concern with a piece of equipment on the overhead line network. This may affect the supply to your property. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely possible by 4:30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:26PM on 23rd February 2021.
